sn35.111:1.1: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding the eye, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
sn35.111:1.2: Without directly knowing and completely understanding the ear …
sn35.111:1.6: mind, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
sn35.111:1.7: By directly knowing and completely understanding the eye, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.
sn35.111:1.8: By directly knowing and completely understanding the ear … nose … tongue …
sn35.111:1.10: mind, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
